original_text: All the people that Ishmael had taken as his prisoners saw Johanan and the officers who were with him. They were very happy to see them.
korean_text: 이스마엘과 함께 있던 모든 백성이 가레아의 아들 요하난과 그와 함께 있던 모든 군 지휘관을 보고 기뻐한지라

sentences.original_text: All the people that Ishmael had taken as his prisoners
sentences.korean_translation: 이스마엘이 자기 포로로 잡아둔 모든 사람이

sentences.original_text: saw Johanan and the officers who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 요하난과 그와 함께 있던 장교들을 보았다

sentences.original_text: They were very happy to see them
